description.narrative: This activity (Development Awareness Fund) is a component of Development Awareness Fund2008-2013 reported by FCDO, with a funding type of 'Not for profit organisation' and a budget of £16,039,517. This component benefits Developing countries, unspecified, and works in the following sector(s): Promotion of development awareness (non-sector allocable). , with the following implementing partners: Crown Agents Limited. The start date is 01-04-2008 and the end date is 30-09-2013.

owner-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office (FCDO)

mailing-address.narrative: Public Enquiry Point, Abercrombie House, Eaglesham Road, East Kilbride, Glasgow G75 8EA
